items.title: Bajaj Housing Finance: Is it the right shelter for investors?
items.description: Multi-fold growth in the loan book and profitability in just six years of operation is commendable

items.title: Rallis attempts another makeover, but investor expectations are muted
items.description: The new CEOâ€™s plans are less capex intensive but even then, these measures will take time to yield results. If executed well, however, the results can be rewarding

items.title: ChrysCapital sells its stake in GeBBS Healthcare to EQT
items.description: The deal offers great market opportunity to offshore vendors such as GeBBS with a broad portfolio of solutions to witness significant tailwinds, driven by cost pressures and lack of talent onshore

items.title: Delivery Diaries: â€˜Charcha over Chaiâ€™, Indiaâ€™s favourite beverage
items.description: At any given point of day, chai orders are more than coffee orders by at least 15-20 per cent, with the difference going up to 40-50 per cent during evenings. Tea is also showing amazing acceptability in regions traditionally known to be that of coffee drinkers

items.title: Workers at Samsung India plant strike, partly hitting production
items.description: Samsung employs under 2,000 workers at its Sriperumbudur plant near the city of Chennai which makes refrigerators and washing machines.

items.title: Bank of Baroda raises Rs 5,000 crore by issuing 10-year infra bonds at 7.26%
items.description: The issue received a strong response from investors with a total demand of Rs 14,215 crore from 105 bids. This helped the bank price the issue at a competitive rate of 7.26 percent pa.
